spas.nhandling.nelements

Class NEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • spas.nhandling.nelements.NElement
      • spas.nhandling.nelements.NEvent

  • public class NEvent
extends NElement
    Event type NElements. Most importantly containing Calendar-type information about their duration etc.

    0.1
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Lauri Lavanti

      • getStartDate

        public java.util.Calendar getStartDate()
        Getter for event's starting date. Contains both time and date.
        Returns:
        Starting date and time for event, or a new Calendar, if it doesn't exist.

      • setEndDate

        public void setEndDate(java.util.Calendar dt)
        Setter for event's ending date. Contains both time and date. Except when handling exercises, remember that they go weekly from start date's time to end date's time.
        Parameters:
        dt - Ending date and time for event.

      • getEndDate

        public java.util.Calendar getEndDate()
        Getter for event's ending date. Contains both time and date. Except when handling exercises, remember that they go weekly from start date's time to end date's time.
        Returns:
        Ending date and time for event, or a new Calendar, if it doesn't exist.
